media:group.media:title: Dante's Inferno - What Happened?
media:group.media:description:

SOURCES:
Kotaku - EA Apologizes for 'Sin to Win' Booth Babe Promo - https://kotaku.com/ea-apologizes-for-sin-to-win-booth-babe-promo-5322781
GameSpot - EA settles OT dispute, disgruntled "spouse" outed - https://www.gamespot.com/articles/ea-settles-ot-dispute-disgruntled-spouse-outed/1100-6148369/
Video Game Sales Wiki - NDP February 2010 - https://vgsales.fandom.com/wiki/NPD_February_2010
Video Game Sales Wiki - NDP March 2010 - https://vgsales.fandom.com/wiki/NPD_March_2010
Ars Technica - Dante’s Inferno interview: of marketing and Gods of War - https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2010/02/dantes-inferno-interview/
Literary Hub - Remember the Dante’s Inferno video game? - https://lithub.com/remember-the-dantes-inferno-video-game-and-its-deranged-gonzo-marketing/
CGMag Online - Going To Hell and Back in Dante’s Inferno With Johnathan Knight - https://www.cgmagonline.com/interviews/to-hell-and-back-an-interview-with-johnathan-knight/
Birth. Movies. Death. - Oscar Isaac On The Challenges Of Keeping It Simple In STAR WARS: THE FORCE AWAKENS - https://web.archive.org/web/20160101153815/https://birthmoviesdeath.com/2015/12/08/oscar-isaac-on-the-challenges-of-keeping-it-simple-in-star-wars-the-force-a
NeoGamer - The Video Game Archive via YouTube - Making of - Dante's Inferno (2010 Video Game) [Behind the Scenes] - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swvcIw8YJdk
MUSIC: Dante's Inferno - Dante Casarma Treloch Thunder Force IV - Because You're The Number One (Name Entry) The Simpsons Game - Around the World in Eighty Bites (Alternate) Darksiders 2 - The Abyssal Plains God of War 2 - The Glory of Sparta Mega Turrican - Stage 3-1 Castlevania Grimoire of Souls - Prologue Project X Zone - Love Does Not End (Virtua Fighter) Divinity Original Sin II - The Queen's High Seas (Tavern Version) Gears of War - We're Under Attack! God Hand - Be Ready For It! Devil Summoner Soul Hackers - Algon NS Building (Reality) Bayonetta - Magnificent 7 (Climax Mix) The Godfather 2 Game - Title Screen Madworld - Survival (Instrumental) Devil Kings - BGM 1 God of War 3 - Overture Gungrave - Cerberuses Dead Space 3 - 200 Years Ago On an Icy Planet Future Tactics The Uprising - Ominous Battle Dante's Inferno - Above Acheron Dante's Inferno - Cerberus
#dantesinferno #mattmcmuscles #godofwarragnarok
